bibl.idno: The Philip S. Hench Walter Reed/Yellow Fever Collection [manuscript] / [collected by] Philip S. Hench ; HEALTHSCI MS-1.

bibl.title: Addresses concerning yellow fever work, [by Philip Showalter Hench?], [19--]

div1.p: [Hench?] lists names and addresses of persons connected with his work on the history of the yellow fever experiments.

div1.head: Addresses concerning yellow fever work, [by Philip Showalter Hench?], [19--]
